# thunder_network_virtual_wire (Resource)

`thunder_network_virtual_wire`: Configure Virtual Wire

__PLACEHOLDER__

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thunder" {
  address  = var.dut9049
  username = var.username
  password = var.password
}
resource "thunder_network_virtual_wire" "thunder_network_virtual_wire" {
  user_tag        = "33"
  virtual_wire_id = 30
}
```
